components.name: Fastlane CLI
components.description: Command-line interface for user interaction and task execution

components.name: Backend Service
components.description: Core logic for automation, plugin execution, and task orchestration

components.name: Configuration Database
components.description: Stores user-specific settings, credentials, and project configurations

components.name: GitHub Integration Service
components.description: Handles GitHub API interactions for CI/CD pipeline automation

data_flows.description: Command execution and parameter exchange between CLI and backend
Read/write operations for storing/retrieving user configurations
API requests for GitHub repository management and CI/CD triggers

trust_boundaries.name: CLI/Backend Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Trust boundary between user-facing CLI and internal backend services

trust_boundaries.name: Backend/GitHub Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Trust boundary between backend services and external GitHub API
